title: Political stability - countries
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index Value is highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
There is a difference of 2.7 between the maximum Country Oman and minimum Country Norway.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index Value for 17 number of Countrys.
The maximum Index Value 3.9 is found at Country Oman and the minimum is found at Norway where Country is 1.2.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index Value is highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
There is a difference of 2.7 between the maximum Country Oman and minimum Country Norway.
max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
Country Oman has the highest Index Value and Norway has the lowest Index Value.
Country Slovenia has the second highest value for Index Value.
The difference of Index Value between the highest and lowest Country is 2.7.
The Country Oman has the highest Index Value, followed by Slovenia, and Slovenia. Down to the Country Norway which is the lowest.
Country Australia, Austria, Luxembourg, and New Zealand have the same Index Value.
The highest value 3.9 at Oman is almost 1.18 times larger than the average value 3.32.
The Index Value is 56.4 if we add up values of all Countrys.
